title: is there a finance club at pes rr?
content: I have gone through [clubs.pes.edu](http://clubs.pes.edu) and I am here because i couldnt find anything there......

comments.body: [clubs.pes.edu](http://clubs.pes.edu) isn't the most accurate website for looking up clubs since it is not updated frequently. The best source is to ask seniors.
I heard there used to be a trading club until last year but I think its not there anymore
I dont think we have any currently, Maybe you can start a new finance club? Talk with HOD about it
I'm in the first year, should I talk to the HOD of S and H?
There's a finance club but it's a "bba club" not a university wide club.
U can work with seniors to revive it.
no department HOD handle all this

No clubs per say but there are events and hackathons for sure, stock market and trading hackathons, business proposal , auction related events and some other events are conducted every sem by management and commerce departments, its open for all.
